RainbruRPG::Core::Singleton

List of all members.

Detailed Description

template<typename T>
class RainbruRPG::Core::Singleton< T >

Implementation of the Meyer's Singleton design pattern.

To have a singleton subclass named Ex you must:

  • subclass this : class Ex : public Singleton<Ex>
  • make copy and assignment constructor forbidden : 
       private:
     Ex(const Ex& obj);
     Ex& operator=(const Ex& obj);
  • create a public default constructor (empty or implemented): 
       public:
     Ex(){};

Warning:
This Singleton implementation is not thread-safe. Do not use it in a multi-thread context.
Todo:
Make sure the Singleton implementation become thread-safe
